page.title: 12PARISH MEETING W.ST.LAWRENCE
page.content: Wick St. Lawrence with a total popul_ ation of two hundred is the only parish in the District of Woodspring that is not large enough to have a Parish Council.Instead it has a Parish Meeting which is called whenever there is a planning application or any other matter of public concern to be discussed.This is an open meeting for all electors.A meeting is usually called for twice a year.As a result of there being no Parish Council the parish does not raise a rate for local spending. The interests of the village are represented on Woodspring District Council by two councillors and on the County Council by one member.District and County Councillors serve for three years, but it is also arranged that they do not become due for re_election at the same time.
